title: Warm spinach, artichoke and cheese dip
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons butter', '285g frozen spinach, thawed', '1 (390g) tin artichoke hearts, drained and chopped', '400g cream cheese, softened', '400g soured cream or creme fraiche', '150g grated Parmesan cheese', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste']
